Did you know most of the autistic community doesn't want a cure?
Did you know that getting pregnant increases the chance of your child having autism?
"A boy on the cusp of manhood can't spend the whole day whackering" To Rebecca Sugar

Well one of the side effects of concerta is loss of appetite which isn't good because I have to remind myself to eat. A few side effects of prozac at the start were headaches and nausea but they have gone away now. Before the medication I was able to focus but not on things I found boring, I had a lot more impluses to do things and my mind would just be racing all the time. I also had mood swings where I'd go from one extreme to the other and I had a lot of anxiety.
Imma likin' da prozac soo much dudez
